projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A React-based weather application that provides real-time weather updates using OpenWeather API. Features include 5-day forecast and location search.

projects.title: Shop Smart
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Includes user authentication, shopping cart, and payment integration.

projects.title: Task Master
projects.description: A minimalist task management application built with React and TypeScript. Features drag-and-drop functionality and local storage persistence.

projects.title: Recipe Finder
projects.description: A recipe search application that helps users find recipes based on available ingredients. Integrates with Spoonacular API.
